text: Oden (おでん, or 関東煮) is one of the Japanese stewing food. Oden contains a lot of ingredients in seasoned soup. Ingredients and soup are different by area, and shop. Recently, Oden is also sold at convenience stores. == Ingredients of Oden == Popular ingredients * Daikon (Japanese radish) ...It is peeled and sliced thickly. It is called King of Oden. * Boiled egg ...It is boiled hen's egg or quail egg. * Shirataki ...Whitish strings of konnyaku. * Atsu-Age ...It is fried bean curd made of Tofu * Tofu * Potato == References == Oden
title: Oden
